titleInfo.title: Defining equations for singular solutions and numerical applications
Numerical methods for bifurcation problems: proceedings of the conference at the University of Dortmund, August 22 - 26, 1983

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Beyn, W.-J.: Defining equations for singular solutions and numerical applications. In: Küpper, T., Mittelmann, H.D., and Weber, H. (eds.) Numerical methods for bifurcation problems: proceedings of the conference at the University of Dortmund, August 22 - 26, 1983. International series of numerical mathematics. 70, p. 42-56. Birkhäuser, Basel [u.a.] (1983).
